task.title: Modifying User Roles
task.shortdesc: If you would like to change the user role of a project member, you can do so from the project dashboard. Only project administrators can add new project administrators.

step.cmd: Select a user (by checking the check mark beside their name) from the Project member column and the click on Modify roles, located at the bottom of the Project member column.
step.info: If you do not select a user before you click on the Modify roles button, you will be taken to a Group overview page. You can select a user from the list and click on the Modify roles button at the bottom of the page to continue on to step 2.

step.cmd: Select the member role you would like to apply to the selected user.
This will take you to a confirmation page. Click on Confirm.
